statements: UPDATE virtual_reality_games SET game_name = 'New Game Name' WHERE game_id = 1;
UPDATE virtual_reality_games SET release_year = 2022 WHERE game_name = 'Example Game';
UPDATE virtual_reality_games SET developer = 'New Developer' WHERE rating > 4.5;
UPDATE virtual_reality_devices SET device_name = 'Updated Device Name' WHERE device_id = 'd1f1813e-e80c-4c34-b692-5e24fd8d9425';
UPDATE virtual_reality_devices SET brand = 'Updated Brand' WHERE device_id = 'a2c9e395-e564-48bb-8ae5-4a7829f771d6';
UPDATE virtual_reality_devices SET release_year = 2022 WHERE device_id = '3f1c3e51-d1e0-4ca4-b6a9-a3f7f87b5c85';
UPDATE VirtualRealityCompany SET headquarters='San Francisco' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE VirtualRealityProduct SET price=499.99 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE VirtualRealityUser SET age=30 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE vr_headsets SET brand = 'Oculus', model = 'Quest 2', release_year = 2020 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vr_games SET genre = 'Action', platform = 'Oculus Quest', release_year = 2021 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE vr_users SET age = 30, location = 'California' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET last_login = NOW() WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE VirtualRealityGames SET genre = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 3;
UPDATE Accessories SET price = 29.99 WHERE accessory_id = 5;
